Room.Name: Main Street/Hillcrest Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillcrest Drive and Main Street.
Room.LongDescription: This is a very busy intersection. Main Street, which continues through to the north and south, is the backbone for most of the commercial industry in the southwestern corridor of Oceancrest. Hillcrest continues to the east and west. To the east, you can start to make out the large estates which populate the richer sections of town.
